mapper.insert: INSERT INTO clothes (clothesID, schoolName, clothessize, clothesType, donorID, gender, status) VALUES (#{clothesID}, #{schoolName}, #{clothessize}, #{clothesType},#{donorID}, #{gender},#{status})
mapper.update: UPDATE clothes SET schoolName=#{schoolName}, clothessize=#{clothessize}, clothesType=#{clothesType},donorID=#{donorID}, gender=#{gender}, status=#{status} WHERE clothesID=#{clothesID}
mapper.select: SELECT pic_url FROM clothes_pics WHERE clothes_id=#{clothes_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM clothes_pics WHERE clothes_id=#{0} AND pic_url=#{1}
